summary: this fixes the dragonborn dlc animation
descriptionHtml:
Halo :)

I gonna make this short.. 

~ This is a possible fix for Dragonborn Animation t-pose.
 I\'ve searched all possible solution and found this :

[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/910728-possible-animation-problem-fix-in-dragonborn-dlc/]FIX[/url]

i made this fix because for anyone is lazy to do that (like me XD)
And to FNIS users..
I don\'t know if FNIS fixes the animation problem..

And a tip to others uses Animation that do not use fnis, This make the dragonborn dlc animation won\'t work..

This might fix your problem..

 make sure you overwrite all :)

Happy gaming :)

Credit Goes to:
Bethesda/SkyrimNexusMod

And oddhand :)
author: UnknownHuman
